locations: TeleAmerica Broadcasting Network Studio Doral, Florida, USA::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: THE MIX TALK SHOW blends four co-host(two female/two male) for balanced conversation between the sexes and stir in experts, Mix Up (hot topics/news), celebrity interviews, live entertainment, Mixology (success stories). THE MIX is about enjoying life, balancing commitments, creating new possibilities, defining and refining lifestyle. We are the Hypen Between Caribbean and American.
imdb.title: The Mix Talk Show
plot: THE MIX TALK SHOW blends four co-host(two female/two male) for balanced conversation between the sexes and stir in experts, Mix Up (hot topics/news), celebrity interviews, live entertainment, Mixology (success stories).
